about_the_game:
This is the official soundtrack to SELF! It includes 35 tracks used for the game.

Tracklist:

  • Main Title
  • Morning
  • Father
  • Disappear
  • Men in Black
  • Friend
  • Take Bus
  • Alone
  • Balloon
  • Balloon Loop
  • A Beautiful Memory
  • Heartbeat
  • Mask
  • Me
  • Toys
  • I Miss You
  • I Miss You Long
  • Truth
  • Ceremony
  • Amusement Park
  • Begin
  • Pass By
  • Dance
  • Force Smile
  • Meet
  • Break Out
  • Barrier
  • Battle 0
  • Battle 1
  • Battle 2
  • Battle 3
  • Battle 4
  • Battle 5
  • Battle 6
  • Battle 7
  • Battle 8

Once you've purchased, you can find a built-in music player in the game.

You can also access your soundtrack by doing the following:

1. Right-click SELF in your Steam game library.
2. Click "Properties."
3. Click on the Local Files tab.
4. Click on "Browse Local Files."
